attributes.action: Prevent Piers Morgan from entering the country
attributes.additional_details:
Piers Morgan is currently facing the prospect of deportation from the United States of America. The consequence of which could see him return to the United Kingdom as a British citizen.

Piers Morgan has allegedly incited public hatred on a vast range of issues. He has allegedly fabricated stories for his own personal benefit and has also allegedly broken the laws of the United Kingdom whilst editor of the Daily Mirror.

Therefore, it may be in the public interest to refuse entry to Piers Morgan if he is returned to the United Kingdom.
